title: See You Offline
summary: Made only for customizing, 'Beast Sword' is played by Yeo-ri, an adult who plays the game with excessive immersion. She meets a newbie player named Lex, who appears outwardly to her taste and eventually succeeds in getting married to him. "To commemorate the wedding we decided to meet at an off-site to make a perfume, but why was my co-worker, who I'm uncomfortable with at work, at the meeting place...?"

title: Perfect Show Window
summary:
Are we allowed to be so excited?
A 9pm curfew, no short skirts, no independence unless married.
K-Hee-won grew up in a Confucian family and dreamed of freedom.
K - Jihwan, the son of a serf, fights to keep the family name alive.
Will their daring plan for freedom succeed?

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Necromancer’s Evolutionary Traits
summary:
After clearing the game Peccata for the twelfth time, Kim Jinhwan finds himself inside its world as Adrias Cromwell, a weak and cowardly character who always ends up dead!

With six months left until he gets killed along with his master for practicing forbidden magic, Adrias starts training and gathering corpses to better his necromancy, determined to survive. 

But will this long-time gamer's necromancy skills and pre-existing knowledge be enough to change the sequence of events?

title: Doctor’s Rebirth
summary:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jin’s life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! He’s reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%9E/458?tab=episode)

title: The Stray Cat Who Doesn’t Know the Greatest Love Song
I Took Away the Tyrant’s Virginity
summary:
“After all, a man must have big breasts… … .”

The man's chest visible through the sunlight is very handsome... … .
for a moment. Who are you naked next to me?

"Emperor… … your majesty?"

Unbelievable.
Unintentionally at a masquerade ball
It seems like he spent the night catching a tyrant.

“How dare you take away the emperor’s virginity and leave?”

No, last night was an agreement!

“If you knocked me down on the bed, you will be responsible.”

yes?
The look in your eyes that silently urges me to answer... … .

“I will take responsibility for the book, Your Majesty.”

I curled my tail.

title: Only Love
summary:
Officially released by the author of "[Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei)" at Winter Comiket 2023.

Alternative Online Retail: [Comic Seymour](https://www.cmoa.jp/title/285162/vol/1/)

title: I am the Precious Daughter of the Greatest Villain in the Fantasy World
summary:
I thought I had reincarnated as the daughter of a rich family, but instead I was born as the daughter of the greatest villain in a martial arts novel?! An indifferent dad and a senior brother who eventually kills me. I need to quickly learn martial arts to be able to survive…! But these two… Why do they keep doting on me?!

---
I've become a part of this Wuxia novel as Lihwa, the thoughtful and gentle daughter of Cheon Ma... who's also the ultimate villain! Known as the Demon King and ruthless leader of the Demonic Sect, he resorts to kidnapping and other nefarious deeds to make sure a boy named Ak Wuryeon never reaches his full potential. Wuryeon doesn't seem THAT bad, but I know he'll one day exact his revenge on my father and that includes me! Can I escape the clutches of my father's enemies and my doomed destiny before it’s too late?

title: The Tang Clan Chronicles
summary: Fabre, a famous million-viewer streamer known for his daring encounters with venomous creatures, is bitten by a black mamba while filming in Africa and wakes up in the mystical world of Murim. To his surprise, the jungles of Murim offer him a peaceful farming life in which he enjoys cultivating various poisonous species. But his tranquility is short-lived when he crosses paths with members of the Tang Clan, the masters of poison and devious tactics. "I see potential in you. Become a part of our family.""

title: A Transmigrated Warden’s Battle for Redemption
summary:
The Rose Prison in Baiyin City is recognized as the strictest and strongest women's prison in the entire continent. 

It gathers the most dangerous and vicious female criminals on the continent, and I——Aiden is the warden in charge of managing this prison. 

But the original "Aiden" is a strong man who is proficient in spears, swords, and even black magic!

I'm just an ordinary person who transmigrated to him, and I don't even know the fighting skills mentioned above...

title: Beneath the Lady’s Mask
summary:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…

title: One Step Forward to the Flower Path
summary:
I lived my whole life being used by other people and died at the age of sixteen. I thought it would be over like that, but when I opened my eyes again, I was back in the past. I thought I'd die while living the rest of my life in pain one more time. 

But suddenly, a father who I had never seen before appeared before me. My dad, whom I hadn't even known existed.

===

"When are you going to take away my powers?"

Dante's eyes shook greatly at Ivanna's words.

"Everyone did. You, when will you take it?"

"…I won't."

"Why?"

Ivanna couldn't understand. Everyone coveted her power. Everyone wanted it, saying she was a sacrifice sent by God for humans. So why does he refuse?

"No one will take your power now. No one will bother you. I'll protect you."

"You're trying to take my power."

"I'm not."

"Everyone said that and stole my power from me. They locked me up in prison."

It was too cruel for a mere five-year-old to say. But the young Ivanna's face had no emotion as if what she said were natural. Dante's heart eventually collapsed when he saw his daughter completely shattered.

---
Abducted from her mother at a young age and tortured for her incredible power, Evanna knew nothing but agony her whole life. That is until one day, she is rescued and returned to the father she never knew, the Duke of Vicente. But as Evanna’s very existence brings back painful memories for the Duke, he must learn how to love her, while Evanna must come to trust her father and heal her trauma. But with Evanna's power highly coveted, can these two overcome their thorny pasts for a rosier future?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8%EA%B9%8C%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%9E%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%95%9C-%EA%B1%B8%EC%9D%8C/2845), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58273697)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/everythings-coming-up-roses)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E4%B9%8B%E9%81%99%E7%9A%84%E5%B9%B8%E7%A6%8F/282)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/One-More-Step-to-the-Flowery-Path/93)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/89964)

title: The Player that can’t Level Up
summary:
When Kim Gigyu received his invitation to become a player (a unique-ability player, at that), he thought his struggles were over. But no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t seem to get past level 1!

After five years of working as a guide on the lower floors of the tower, he’s finally discovered his ability to link with “Egos” and raise his stats. As his new skills unlock adventures in unexplored gates, Gigyu gets his chance to defy expectations and show the world that rank isn’t everything.

title: Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
summary:
The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.

---

**Original Webtoon**: 
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/24688)

title: Evil Dragon Is Reincarnated! Revenge Begins at the Age of Five!
summary: I was once the legendary red dragon who stood at the top of the world. For thousands of years, my brethren have been murdered by humans and the desire for revenge slowly turned into my only mission in this world! However, I failed. On the day of the decisive battle against human beings, I died with hatred in my heart... if there is an afterlife, I will definitely avenge my kind. If there is an afterlife, I will make these filthy humans pay with their blood! If there is an afterlife—hmm? I was reincarnated as a weak human baby?!!

title: Dearest Fiancé, I Know You Despise Me [Official]
Beauty and the Beasts
summary:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: The Tyrant’s Family Lasts Thanks To Her Inner Voice
summary: After being struck to death by someone falling from the sky, Jiu Jiu found herself causing a commotion in the King of Hell’s palace. To resolve the chaos, the King of Hell allowed her to enter the world of a book, where she became a princess. However, she was no ordinary princess—she was confined to the cold palace. From the start, due to the heroine’s slander, her tyrant father decided to sentence her to death. Jiu Jiu was left speechless, thinking to herself: “No wonder the Xi Chu kingdom collapses 10 years later. With such an indiscriminate tyrant, the fact that it even lasts 10 years is a miracle.”

title: Romance in the Beast World
summary:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. "Skills" exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with 
"Noblesse oblige." When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, "Noblesse oblige" is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces! Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that "Noblesse oblige" can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine!

title: The Delivery Man From Murim
summary: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…

title: Onsaemiro
summary:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5083255), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=745472)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/xiangluqiyuan/list?title_no=1527)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=2086)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=3232)

title: Level 999 Goblin
summary:
The protagonist Kim Chulsoo works his ass off for a living as a manual laborer in real life and by grinding for and selling items in a game.

He finally gets the chance to switch to a hidden class, hoping for that one big shot in life…!

But the hidden class turns out to be... a Goblin Summoner?!

title: The Circumstances of an idiot
summary:
When spring came, when the colorful wildflowers budded in the wide meadows, Irene had to struggle with anguish.

"Hmph..."

A tickling sensation from a secret place. When she went into heat, she couldn't do anything for a week. Worse yet, she couldn't find a male to share her estrus with.

Meanwhile, Knox caught a whiff of a sweet scent on the breeze blowing in from somewhere. The scent of a female in heat.

He pulled back Irene's robe, and her snow-white hair spilled out. The corners of his tightly pressed lips lifted.

"A female anthromorph... Come with me."

title: To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: The Stars And I
summary:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)

title: I Punished the Villainous Young Master, and He Became Obsessed with Me
summary:
Reincarnated into an 18+ novel, I became the villainous maid who bullies the powerless protagonist.

Determined to stop the world’s destruction and live a rosy life as a transmigrator, I decided to change the original story.

But when I finally met the protagonist, he was... a five-year-old boy with chubby, round cheeks?

Stripped of his powers and reduced to a child’s form, this wasn’t part of the plan. Well, since we’re here, can I at least pinch those cheeks?

Thus begins my second life—can I successfully prevent the original protagonist’s rampage and save the world?

title: Only for Love
summary:
Rintarou, the boy I've been friends with since we were small. Large, grim, popular. He turned down a girl again… What a waste!

“No, because I love you.”

…Huh? What!? That's the first time I've heard about this!!! W-w-w-why me-

Damn…!!! I can't believe he would confess to me. I feel like I lost and it's frustrating. Now that it's come to this, I'll test him and see if he's good enough to be my boyfriend!!

title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me
summary: Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: Savage Castle
summary:
Else von Roatte has never been loved by anyone. So when her servant Ian becomes the first person to show her kindness, Else knows she has to make him hers even if it’s against his will. As his master, she orders him to join her in bed each night, a fine line between duty and desire shadowing their every move. But little does Else know that Ian doesn’t actually hate her at all. In fact, Ian is secretly the exiled King Sybil, who plans to turn the tables and make Else entirely his once he reclaims his throne...

---
Due to his uncle's conspiracy, the king leaves the throne and hides in a desolate land. The story unfolds with the king and a pitiful yet beautiful noble lady, who has made him her slave, entangled in obsession and affection.

title: Beyond Walpurgis
summary:
During the mid-19th century in Prussia, Dr. Maria Faust, known as the 'Witch of Könihilsberg' who made a pact with the devil Mephistopheles, meets Martin, a curious young man who dreams of becoming a novelist, while on a journey to find 'a way to bring the dead back to life'. . 

Faust is once knocked down by the villain Valentin, who was hostile to him, but rises again with the help of Martin, who admires her, and his student Wagner.

After that, Faust finds the truth he has been looking for, but he also realizes his mistakes... In the end, Faust finally feels the joy of life by saving the dying.

Was she really a witch?

title: The Ugly Lady’s Secret Pouch
summary:
When Yunseol wakes up as "Laila el Este" in the novel, “Bird Cage,” she is horrified.

Though Laila may be beautiful, her beauty is the reason the three male leads obsess over her and make her life a living hell. As such, Laila decides to use her professional makeup skills to become high society’s infamous ugly duckling.

But out of nowhere, she receives a marriage proposal from Duke Montefeltra, a fellow outcast who is ostracized for his unattractive looks.

Will this turn of events help Laila escape the novel’s bad ending once and for all?

title: My Overly Sweet Boss
summary:
All of a sudden, my parents decided to play matchmaker and set me up with another man. I don't have a boyfriend and I thought it wouldn't hurt to meet the guy, but it turned out to be my manager, a.k.a. The Demon Boss!

Moe is frightened when her parents force her and the Demon Boss to live together on the premise of marriage. But, to her surprise, the manager seems like a totally different person at home...?

A sweet slapstick office romance between a Demon Boss and his klutzy subordinate.

---
• [Official Thai](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1662)

title: Is This Lie Is Also a Destiny?
Yeonwoo’s Innocence
summary:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)

title: My Hot Harem Has Turned Cold On Me!
Return of The Genius Swordmaster
summary: When war-orphan-turned-warrior Agrick dies on the battlefield, his last regret is that he never got to fully develop his talents. The next moment, he's reborn... into a family of geniuses! Now, as Dane Sogress, he has to choose to be a spearman like his father, an assassin like his mother, or a summoner or mage like his sisters. But instead of picking, Dane decides to learn it all! Can Dane finally become the master of skills he was meant to be? Or will his take two at life end in failure again?

title: Sleeping Ranker
summary:
“We’re only taking a break for about 30 seconds? I’m not imagining things, right?”
 “…Yes.” 

After 15 hours of hunting, Hyunsung asked to rest for a while, and after 30 seconds, he had to get up again and started hunting.
Actually, Hyunsung has a special skill.

[Thananos’ narcolepsy skill is activated.]
[You’re being forced into a sleep state.]

After sleeping for a while and waking up, I got an item? 
Pay close attention to the story of the God-Rank Class, the descendant of Thananos, the unstoppable Hyunsung.

title: The Real Reason We’re Getting Married
The Young Villainess Sees Through It All
summary: Although born into an aristocrat family, Alicia has always faced mistreatment. The main reason was her being an illegitimate child. The only person who showered her affection was her younger sister, Lilian. But she too ended up betraying her which resulted to her untimely death. After waking up, Alicia finds herself back to her seven-year-old self. She notices a ring shining on her finger and she realizes that she’s suddenly able to read people’s inner thoughts. With her “child-like form” and her “mind-reading ability,” she plans to take revenge as a young villainess.

title: Forget That Night, Your Majesty
summary:
Volume 1: ||  
► Smile Maker, by Scarlet Beriko  
Childhood friends Yae Akane & Sakura Kasumi were inseparable as children until Yae and her family moved overseas. A few years later Yae is back and they are in the same school but now Sakura continuously ignores Yae?  
► Lemon's, by Matsuzaki Miyuki  
Shibata thought she had ditched Sakamoto when she finished high school. But later in life they meet again, working at the same job. Shibata left high school in bitterness and got a boyfriend, but she can't seem to get the taste of Sakamoto's lips out of her mind. (M-U)  
||  
  
Volume 2: ||  
► Mine, by Scarlet Beriko  
Nekomata was always alone until she met Maki. Now she makes a bento for her every day in the hope of remaining close to Maki. When Nekomata makes a new friend in her cooking class, however, Maki seems angry…  
► Voice of Her Fingertips, by Maeda Tomo  
Saeki thinks of herself as a lazy, boring, and apathetic person and has no idea what to write in her future-plans survey. Kurata, of the art club, piques her curiosity by constantly sketching.  
► Cry, Laugh, and See You Tomorrow, by Fujisawa Makoto  
||  
  
Volume 3: ||  
► Sabotage, by Kano Ayumi  
||  
  
Volume 4: ||  
► Algae, by Fuji Tamaki  
||  
  
Volume 5: ||  
► Sugar Spot, by Matsuzaki Miyuki  
► That Onee-sama Feeling, by Ohjima Tamaki  
||  
  
Volume 6: ||  
► Miyabi-chan Down from the Moon, by Hirao Auri  
► Last 10 Millimeters, by Matsuzaki Miyuki  
While riding home on the bus one day, a girl sits down by Sai and lays her head on her shoulder while she sleeps. When she leaves she leaves behind her lip balm. Sai then becomes obsessed with returning the lip balm, taking the same bus every day. What will Sai do when she finally meets with the lip balm girl again? What are the feelings that underlie her obsession? (Source: MU)  
||  
  
Volume 7: ||  
► Bare-faced Beauty, by Asaoka Minagi  
► Love & Hate, by Ohjima Tamaki  
► Surely, Always, , by Hirao Auri  
''I can never make Sora have a child…''  
||  
  
Volume 8: ||  
► Little by Little, by Kari Sumako  
► Afterschool Stabbing, by Satou Saori  
► Tender Night, by Hirao Auri  
Riku attends an all girls school and is tall, pretty, and the ace of the volleyball team. It goes without saying that she is quite popular, and as such receives many confessions. However, she turns all the girls down because she knows they are only using her as a replacement for a guy and that they would eventually leave her. Will she ever find someone that won't leave her?  
||  
  
Volume 9: ||  
► Place Your Legs Here, by Osawa Amane  
||  
  
Volume 12: ||  
► Harukaze in the Heart!!, by Kiyota Tomo  
► A Love Smeared in Ashes, by Yotsuhara Furiko  
||  
  
Volume 13: ||  
► The Person Who Cheers the People Who Try, by Hirao Auri  
► Rocks and Murderous Intents, by Yajika Chinami  
► Anemone, by Ootomo Megane  
About a relationship that starts of as one time experiment, but slowly turns into something more.  **(Erotica)**
||  
  
Volume 14: ||  
► No Carriage, No Pumpkin, No Prince, by Yotsuhara Furiko  
Sequel to **A Love Smeared in Ashes**  
► Pancake Tuesday, by Sasayama Aki  
► Kami-sama no Susumori, by Itou Hachi  
||

title: They Say i Was Born a King’s Daughter
summary:
After spending most of her youth fielding the attention of countless wealthy suitors, Suhee Kim finally finds true love with a steady boyfriend named Jinsu Han. But then tragedy strikes, and Suhee is murdered in cold blood.  
To Suhee's surprise, she is immediately reincarnated as a baby girl named Sanghee Kim, who just so happens to be a princess! Plus, she is fully conscious of her past life. There's just one problem: in this society, women are seen as totally inferior, even princesses. Appalled by the treatment of women, Sanghee is determined to change the kingdom's patriarchal ways. Will Sanghee be able to succeed, or will she be stuck living her second life being treated as a lowly woman?

title: I Regressed to Level Up Instead of Being a Simp
summary: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: Seabird and the Wolf
summary:
Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.  
  
In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.
